title: Creamless creamy carrot and coriander soup
ingredients: ['15 carrots, washed and chopped into thirds', '1 onion,quartered', '2 medium potatoes, quartered', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', 'Big bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '3 pints chicken stock', '1 teaspoon white pepper']
